headline: What Contributed to the Surge of Public Service Enterprise Group Incorporated (PEG) in Q3
summary: Sound Shore Management, an investment management firm, has released its investor letter for the third quarter of 2024. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. The fund’s Investor Class (SSHFX) and Institutional Class (SSHVX) appreciated 6.70% and 6.74%, respectively, in the third quarter of 2024, outperforming 5.89% return for the Standard & Poor’s 500 […]
